title: scenario: rito has now asked you to choose three champions to have their very own announcer packs
body:
once you decide, the packs will be up for RP to fill rito's wallet some more, but you'll be given them for free

they have also asked you to choose three champion skins with different voices as announcer packs, giving you six total announcer packs after you've made your final decision

which champion/champion skins do you choose?

personally...

for a champion: {{champion:161}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:119}} 

for a champion skin: blackfrost anivia, gentleman cho'gath, forecast janna
